item.title: STEAM DOCTOR
item.description: Steam Doctor is a disinfection chamber designed to provide steam powered sterialization for people in public places. It also has audio/visual output features. In this project I was responsible for design and development of the firmware that operates the system. Requirements: The system is required to have the following properties: Detect human presence. Output audio feedback through speakers to notify the user about status and/or call to action. Take user’s temperature.
